title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Rev up heroic adventures with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! Perfect for preschool fans, this collectible set brings the high-speed fun of Batwheels to life with five favorite characters: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. Each vehicle is crafted in Batcast Metal diecast for a sturdy, premium feel and smooth-rolling, working wheels that are ready for chase scenes, daring escapes, and epic showdowns.

- Authentic 1:55 scale diecast vehicles made for little hands and big imaginations
- Includes 5 character cars for instant storytelling: heroes and villains for head-to-head play
- Durable metal bodies with rolling wheels for action-packed racing
- Pairs perfectly with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately, subject to availability)
- Encourages imaginative play and storytelling for ages 3 and up

From city-saving missions to high-speed rivalries, this 5-pack is the ultimate starter or add-on set for young Super Hero fans. Gift-ready and built to last, the Batwheels crew is geared up to roll into adventureâ€”just like on the show. Start the engines and let the hero fun begin!
